data.name: Who Shuffled My Shapes? Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Who Shuffled My Shapes? Official Soundtrack

The official soundtrack for Who Shuffled My Shapes? captures the relaxed nature of the game. This soundtrack gives you access to the game's array of purposefully composed short lofi tracks to listen to at your leisure.


The album lasts for approximately 90 minutes.
